name: Dice Capitalist
description:
In the near future people make most of their decisions using dice.  In this capitalism oriented world you choose stock trading to earn some cash (or lose all of it). Buy stocks using dice, sell them randomly for profit and earn your place at the top of the leaderboard.

Use the Tab key to access the menu during gameplay.

Gameplay

In the game you basically buy and trade stock randomly.

Buying

When you want to buy stock you get 3 different dice (could be 4 to 11 sided) which you grab and place on the three given places:

  1. the first one determines which stock you will buy from the 11 in front of you
  2. the second one determines the amount
  3. the third one is a multiplier for the amount.

For example if you get a 7 sided, 4 sided and 11 sided die and place them in this order, that means that based on the die rolls you could buy minimum 1 and maximum 44 stock from the first or the second... or the seventh option.

Selling

Selling is pretty simple. You can sell stock randomly from your collection by clicking on the button. This goes on until you run out of stock (then you can buy again) or you just simply don't want to sell more.

Goal

You can watch as the prices change and try to buy / sell accordingly to maximise your profit and earn a higher spot on the leaderboard.

Graphics: Inkscape

Leaderboard: LootLocker
